channel.title: I was wondering
channel.description: I was wondering if you could make like a warp command? Like have 2 or 3 teleport spots you get to choose as like make home 1, home 2 or something like that

item.title: I was wondering
item.dc:creator: @x_vain_x x vain x
item.description:
@x_vain_x wrote:

Yes you could do that to have people to trust use them but the point of what I was saying is give us like home 1 and home 2 teleport. That could help people have fun and have multiple home’s and yes people talk about the griefing and shit. The only way you would get rid of it would be to take out the teleport to home or spawn and that would ruin a big part of the game, so alot of people would be mad. Though were a small community it will get bigger hopefully and when it does people wan’t to have the most fun that they can have fun. Meaning building alot of shit and that I have been working on a town and I have my home and a island I have and its a pain to run and swim to my places. That alot of people will agree that it would be a paint to run and run to get somewhere. Well atleast you maybe when all the towns are finished make teleports to every town like I think im doing camelot so like /camelot and for varrock do /varrock. I hope alot of people get what I am saying.

Read full topic

item.title: I was wondering
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473673.msg3463544#msg3463544 date=1294709328]
I made one warp to a tower that I made; I don’t really care much about it, but if you go to the top and change your render distance it is very cool.
[/quote]Warps can only be using by admins (or staff).

Matthew was wondering if we could have 1-2, maybe 3 set teleports that are saved to each character’s name. Thus we can have multiple things, etc: I have a huge duneon/home-type place, I have an island-farm, and I have a make-shift castle-hut in the mountains. I can only visit one of them with /home and it’s a real pain to get to them from spawn/my house, with or without the map.[/quote]Anyone can use warps… only admins can make them.

Read full topic

item.title: I was wondering
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:8, topic:377788”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=473673.msg3463572#msg3463572 date=1294709774]

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=473673.msg3463566#msg3463566 date=1294709687]

I made one warp to a tower that I made; I don’t really care much about it, but if you go to the top and change your render distance it is very cool.
[/quote]Warps can only be using by admins (or staff).

Matthew was wondering if we could have 1-2, maybe 3 set teleports that are saved to each character’s name. Thus we can have multiple things, etc: I have a huge duneon/home-type place, I have an island-farm, and I have a make-shift castle-hut in the mountains. I can only visit one of them with /home and it’s a real pain to get to them from spawn/my house, with or without the map.

inb4telegrief
[/quote]There could be a system of time-based events, such as no teleporting after a certain amount of time after using another teleport. It’s just an idea.

No I mean a player could simply set up a warp away from the place they plan to grief, do their thing, and teleport away without anyone knowing.[/quote]
you can already do this using /sethome and /spawn

EDIT:Damn you beat me to it

Read full topic

Matthew was wondering if we could have 1-2, maybe 3 set teleports that are saved to each character’s name. Thus we can have multiple things, etc: I have a huge duneon/home-type place, I have an island-farm, and I have a make-shift castle-hut in the mountains. I can only visit one of them with /home and it’s a real pain to get to them from spawn/my house, with or without the map.

inb4telegrief
[/quote]There could be a system of time-based events, such as no teleporting after a certain amount of time after using another teleport. It’s just an idea.[/quote]

No I mean a player could simply set up a warp away from the place they plan to grief, do their thing, and teleport away without anyone knowing.

item.title: I was wondering
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

x vain x:

I was wondering if you could make like a warp command? Like have 2 or 3 teleport spots you get to choose as like make home 1, home 2 or something like that

Griefers would have easy access to long worked on cities. I think these should only activate after 2 hours of playtime, plently of time for a griefer to get caught.
